name: TalentsforGood
0:
”Alexa open Talents four Good”
”Alexa open Talents four Good and ask for a painter”
”Alexa tell Talents four Good I want to help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talents four good
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill, Talents for Good, matches people who are in need of talents, skills, services, or expertise with those who want to volunteer it. It uses Voice to make a positive impact in our world!

If you're in need of help in your life, just open Talents for Good and ask Alexa for help. She'll search through our nationwide list of people who want to volunteer their services, skills, and talents to help you! If there is nobody offering the help you need at the moment, our skill will even take your phone number and text you when someone volunteers it.

If you're looking to pay it forward and share your talents, skills, and expertise with those who are in need, just open Talents for Good and tell Alexa that you want to help. She'll get your talent, zip code, the number of miles away from you you're willing to offer the service, your name or your business name, and your phone number, so people can contact you. You may even share multiple talents. This skill is also perfect for anyone needing to do community service, including high school students, civic groups, and community helpers.

This skill solves the problem of connecting people who have something to offer with those who are in need. Typically, these people only connect accidentally or by word of mouth. This skill makes it easy to connect. And those asking for help can do so anonymously.

This skill inspires people to take action! it's so easy to volunteer your services to those in need. Imagine how rewarding that first phone call will be, when someone says Alexa recommended them to you for help!

This skill delivers a seamless user experience via voice! It's so easy and natural to volunteer or get help. Just tell Alexa what you need and she'll connect the dots for you, quickly!
